StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetProgramBonusAmount]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@ContractID int, @Program_Code varchar(3), @Bonus_Amount numeric OUTPUT AS
DECLARE @ProgAssignDate date.me
SELECT @ProgAssignDate = PROGRAM_ASSIGNMENT_DATE FROM PROGRAM_AVAILABILITY PA INNER JOIN PROGRAM PG ON PA.PROGRAM_ID = PG.PROGRAM_ID WHERE PA.CONTRACT_ID = @ContractID AND PG.PROGRAM_CODE = @Program_Code
--- make sure we retrieve only one bonus amount record --- we want the most recent bonus amount record where the --- e.ec.ve date is <= the program assignment date. SET @BONUS_AMOUNT = (SELECT TOP 1 ISNULL(PC.BONUS_AMOUNT, 0) BONUS_AMOUNT FROM PROGRAM PG INNER JOIN PROGRAM_CRITERIA PC ON PG.PROGRAM_ID = PC.PROGRAM_ID WHERE PROGRAM_CODE = @PROGRAM_CODE AND PROGRAM_CRITERIA_ED_DATE <= @ProgAssignDate ORDER BY PROGRAM_CRITERIA_ED_DATE DESC)
